text: Hi everyone! I have a very rookie questions for you; I just set up a local development using my personal CMS acces key. My colleague wants to be able to change the files as well. Does she need to set it up the same way I did, and then fetch the folders from HubSpot, or can she just open the project from my folder?
both are possible. ideally you would want to do it separately, but i’m sure you could argue the case to do it that way.

I think the best way to get work done is to do work. After the work is done, figure out what was good or bad. You could end up in a nightmare situation by having that person work from your folder, but I really don’t understand the entirty of the workflow and what you are planning
